message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $22,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me there?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me halfway?
